title: I played the new Reworked Urgot and my FPS went from 120 to 80 to 30
body:
Especially when using his W

Urgot isn't the only champion that makes the game laggy for me, Swain is another one, whenever using his Q, W and his R

Note: I'm playing on the lowest setting possible

replies.body: You might have some bad game files struggling to render the game, so changing your settings might not improve it.  Instead, the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide should help fix this up.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in case of a repair.
